# Basic Spatial Autocorrelation (Simulated)

This notebook demonstrates how to calculate and visualize spatial patterns in vulnerability scores.

```{r setup, message=FALSE}
library(sf)
library(dplyr)
library(ggplot2)
library(spdep)
```

## Load and Prepare Data

```{r}
df <- read.csv("spatial_districts.csv")
coordinates <- df[, c("lon", "lat")]
nb <- knn2nb(knearneigh(coordinates, k=2))
lw <- nb2listw(nb, style="W")
```

## Calculate Moran's I

```{r}
moran.test(df$vulnerability_index, lw)
```

## Plot Distribution

```{r}
ggplot(df, aes(x=vulnerability_index)) +
  geom_histogram(bins=10, fill="steelblue") +
  theme_minimal()
```
